name: Destined Soul
description: Others can sense that yours is a fate unlike that of most mortals. Greatness beckons you!
effect: If any destiny dice are discarded in the destiny phase, this hero can take one of them to use when they take their turn in the following hero phase. Place the destiny dice on an empty space on their hero dice track. Using this destiny dice does not lock any of the destiny dice that are on the fate board.
